summary:
***NO DLC\'S REQUIRED*** 

Basically just adds a lore friendly spell that brings fire to your foes. The spell can be found at the SKYFORGE. 
It is a destruction spell that summons some fire and when directly hitting someone he flies away. Also has a large hitbox.
descriptionHtml:
***NO DLC\'S REQUIRED*** 

Basically just adds a lore friendly spell that brings fire to your foes. The spell can be found at the SKYFORGE. 
It is a destruction spell that summons some fire and when directly hitting someone he flies away. Also has a large hitbox.  

This is my first mod on the nexus so please don\'t blame me if it wasn\'t what you expected still a very fun spell.
author: Spycho
